title: SHOW 119 - Matt Hancock (Election Special #7)
itunes:title: SHOW 119 - Matt Hancock (Election Special #7)
itunes:subtitle: The Secretary of State for Health joins Matt to dâ€¦
description:
The Secretary of State for Health joins Matt to discuss the NHS, going viral and staying healthy on the campaign trail. Plus: is the NHS safe from Trump? Does Brexit threaten our medicine? How did the Health Secretary's granny live to such a ripe old age? And what tips would Matt give Jeremy Corbyn in facing Boris Johnson in a TV debate? Follow Matt Hancock on Twitter: @MattHancock Follow Matt Forde on Twitter: @mattforde Email your funny campaign stories to politicalpartypodcast@gmail.com Sign up to Matt's mailing list for free treats and goodies: http://mattforde.com/mailing-list

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
